崵崵崵

崵字的基本解释

崵
yáng
〔首崵〕即“首阳山”。有多处，分别在今中国河北省卢龙县（今名阳山）、山西省永济县等。

崵
dàng
古同“砀”，山名。

崵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yáng］
［《廣韻》與章切，平陽，以。］
(1)山名。
(2)谷名。
[②]［dàng］
［《廣韻》徒朗切，上蕩，定。］
山名。芒砀山。

崵字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　崵； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页315第22
【廣韻】與章切【集韻】余章切，?音陽。【說文】崵山，在遼西。一曰嵎夷，崵穀也。　又首崵山，在洛陽。　又【廣韻】徒朗切【集韻】【韻會】待朗切，?音蕩。義同。　【集韻】或作蕩。通作碭。

崵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
崵字的起名意思

暂无。

Crest
Basic explanation of words
Crest
yáng
〔First crest〕 means "Shouyang Mountain". There are many places, including Lulong County in Hebei Province (now known as Yangshan) and Yongji County in Shanxi Province.
Crest
dàng
The ancient same "Dang", the name of the mountain.
Crest
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yáng］
["Guangyun" and chapter cut, Pingyang, to. ]
(1) The name of the mountain.
(2) Valley name.
[②]［dàng］
["Guangyun" Tu Langqie, Dangdang, Ding. ]
Mountain name. Mount Mangdang.
Crest
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　崵; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 315 and 22
[Guang Yun] Cut with Zhang [Ji Yun] Yu Zhang cut,? Yin Yang. [Said the text] Ridge Mountain, in the west of Liaoning. One said, Yiyi, and also ridge valley.　Shou Lang Mountain, in Luoyang.　[Guang Yun] Tu Langqie [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] Waiting for Langqie, the sound swings. The same meaning.　【Ji Yun】or Zuo Dang. Pass for Dang.
Crest
